greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the number whose Pierce expansion has the sequence of factorial numbers (A000142) as coefficients.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,i,k; a:=0; k:=1; for i from 0 by 1 to n do k:=k*i!; a:=a+(-1)^i/k; print(evalf(a,100)); od; end: P(100);
results.author: _Paolo P. Lava_ and _Giorgio Balzarotti_, Feb 26 2008
